fire extinguisher should be properly instal ion the wall outside the laboratory room and office to make them more accessible to student and employee in time of fire disaster

a periodic fire drill activity should be encourage in every college to enhance the knowledge of student on how to use properly the fire extinguisher in time of fire disaster
